q: Orlando Magic on Saturday night. Allen Iverson , averaging an NBA-leading 29.7 points, was 17-of-36 from the field and made 24 of 27 free throws. Michael Jordan previous high was 58 against Allan Houston on Jan. 15, 2002. I score a career high and we won the game, Allen Iverson said. "That's how you draw it up in your dreams." to the openness of the Web. The Beeb confronted Eric Schmidt with Google's apparent failure to catch the social network wave, citing the failure of Google Buzz. Eric Schmidt concedes that Google has been late adding social capabilities to our core products but says that Buzz and other current plans are not an attempt to copy Facebook. executive chairman, "a lot of my time" will be devoted to dealing with regulators and other government officials, Eric Schmidt said. "We've got very complicated government issues," he said, adding that we move quickly, and we tend to be disruptive at scale. European Union officials opened a formal antitrust probe last year into Google Inc. search results, while in China the company opted to shut down its mainland search engine rather than censor results for user queries.

Don't you believe it's possible that by honoring this felon you sent the wrong message to the kids?... Now the kids say "This guy killed dogs he went to jail he's on probation and he's getting honored with a key to the city that is supposed to be presented to someone like a war hero,' one of the hosts said. has labelled Christina Aguilera 's performance at the Super Bowl as "bad". The singer fluffed her words whilst performing The Star-Spangled Banner at one of America's biggest sporting events. Simon Cowell said: It sounded like 100,000 people in a stadium had just sat on a cat. He went on to say: "I always say this, this is what happens when you perform in front of an audience- even someone as experienced as Christina Aguilera . You can get it wrong.
